## Map

```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(here)

muni <- read_sf(here("shapefiles", "Municipality.geojson"))

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addPolygons(data = muni) %>%
  setView(lat = 41.85003, lng = -87.65005, zoom = 10)

```
